<title level="1" pfs="">[Castruccio Irovetti](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2189)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Since his flight from Numeria, Castruccio Irovetti has ruled Pitax for over half a decade, and in that time, he has firmly established his hold over this River Kingdom's political scene through a mix of cunning choice and luck. While he does have the support of the [nymph](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=77) [Nyrissa](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2197), he hid from her the fact that he's managed to recover the magical sword she charged him with retrieving, making him loath to call upon her for aid. Furthermore, if he can defeat the PCs, surely that show of strength will bolster his reputation in her eyes, so that he can then present [_Briar_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1743) to her for an even greater reward. In Nyrissa, Irovetti sees the only candidate he could imagine taking on as his Queen.

[Maze](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), [Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267), [Uncontrollable Dance](/Spells.aspx?ID=347) (3 slots)

[Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **4th**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381), [Lingering Composition](/Spells.aspx?ID=389), [Inspire Heroics](/Spells.aspx?ID=388)

**Rituals** DC 37 inveigle

**Signature Spells**   Irovetti can heighten the following spells freely: [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [_duplicate foe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [_private sanctum_](/Spells.aspx?ID=235), [_sending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [_soothe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=291), and [_vampiric touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=354).

**Songstrike** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Irovetti sings out a short aria that resonates within his rod of razors, causing it to become infused with sonic energy. He attempts a Strike with the rod of razors, and if he hits, he inflicts an additional 5d10 sonic damage (DC 37 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save)

</column>
